General.Name: Steppe Cement
General.Description: Steppe Cement Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the production and sale of cement and clinkers in Kazakhstan. It also provides consultancy services; and transmission and distribution of electricity. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
General.Address: Suite 10.1, Rohas Perkasa, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 50450

1.Name: Mr. Peter  Durnev
1.Title: Gen. Director of Central Asia Cement JSC
